result.execSummary:
The defendant Candido Salinas Jr. was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Candido Salinas Jr.

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney D Henderson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Deft pleads guilty.  Court finds deft guilty.  Court imposes $50 fine plus costs, deft to submit DNA sample and pay $200 DNA surcharge, bond applied, 30 DTP remainder due or civil judgment.

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney D Henderson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Henderson states he was just appointed.  STC continued to 3/30/16 at 8:45am.  Bond continued.

NO RECORD MADE.  Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Deft states he would like more time to retain counsel.  Deft files petition for court appointed counsel.  Court appoints Doug Henderson as advocate counsel; deft to pay $50/mo commencing 3/15/16.  STC continued to 3/10/16 at 8:45am.  Bond continued.

205 p.m.  Special Prosecutor Attorney Daniel Tombasco  appeared for the State.   Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clk  Janell Thwing.  Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.   Not Guilty Plea entered by the Court. Defendant requests Jury Trial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 8, 2016 at 02:10 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for January 28, 2016 at 08:30 am.   $100 cont posted Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).
